tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE tourist_feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    destination_name VARCHAR(255),
    feedback_text TEXT,
    rating FLOAT,
    sustainability_rating FLOAT,
    date_submitted TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE tourist_feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    destination_id INT,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    rating INT,
    submission_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE sustainability_practices (
    destination_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    destination_name VARCHAR(50),
    sustainable_rating INT,
    travelers_impact INT,
    community_engagement VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE tourist_reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    tourist_name VARCHAR(100),
    destination_name VARCHAR(100),
    feedback TEXT,
    rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE feedback_analysis (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    destination_id INT,
    sustainability_rating INT,
    average_rating FLOAT,
    feedback_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    tourist_id INT,
    destination_id INT,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    destination_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    feedback_rating INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (destination_id) REFERENCES destinations(destination_id)
);

CREATE TABLE reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    feedback_id INT,
    review_text TEXT,
    review_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (feedback_id) REFERENCES feedback(feedback_id)
);
